About

Once a engineer student, I realized I was more into understanding society than machines. So I decided to learn economics and I am currently working as an underpaid intern at the OECD in Paris. Interested in international development, data science, econometrics and languages.

In my free time I enjoy taking photographs, reading books and articles and traveling. I am also trying to complete 101 things/projects/goals in 1001 days. So far my list is 1% done, but I still have

This website has been hand coded with love in Barcelona with Jekyll. You can find the source code in Github. It is written using Sublime.

(This website is still a work-in-progress)

gps: barcelona

working on: finding a job/internship
